argument.name: obj
argument.description: A pointer to an image control on a form.

page.description: Called by right click menu on Bitmap image field on a form or browse.
page.discussion: The A5_GET_BITMAP() displays a dialog box that assists you in navigating to and selecting a Windows Bitmap (.BMP) image to place into a Bitmap Image field in a table. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
